embeddedItem.name: Ancient Engine
embeddedItem.desc: Mechanical engine left behind from the Old World. Advanced material used for enhancement.
embeddedItem.lore:
It uses Geomarrow as the energy source. When powered, it spews wandering auroras, not sparkles.

"Only the Technology Division directly under the Supreme Guardian has access to information regarding the Old World. I lost my privileges after I was fired."
comeFrom: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

23680.name: Sampo
23680.lore:
A merchant who freely travels between the Overworld and the Underworld.
He acts like he is everyone's friend, is enthusiastically humorous, and is good at bantering.

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

79822.name: Incessant Rain
79822.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79822.lore:
She leaves the cover of the awning, opens her umbrella, and dives into an alley while humming a lighthearted tune.
The rain stops a little while after.

She scratches her head and swipes her screen open. After a few taps, raindrops begin to fall in an area no wider than her umbrella.
The pitter-patter sound of raindrops on the umbrella mixes with music from the game. All was calm and relaxing.
"Gaming and rain totally go together."

79827.name: Something Irreplaceable
79827.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79827.lore:
"Should a day come when even I'm not here anymore, please look after this database, Svarog."
(Who is this... Why is this message in my records...)
"Do you have something that's irreplaceable, Svarog?"
(Irreplaceable... broken parts... can simply be replaced...)
"You'll definitely find it one day, Svarog."
(Such things... will only cause trouble...)

"When that time comes... You should leave this place behind."

91539.name: Silver Wolf
91539.lore:
A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a genius hacker.
She sees the universe as a massive immersive simulation game and has fun with it.
She's mastered the skill known as "aether editing," which can be used to tamper with the data of reality.

107621.name: Hook
107621.lore:
Boss (self-proclaimed) of an Underworld adventure squad, The Moles.
She loves freedom and sees life as a series of adventures.

170099.name: Clara
170099.lore:
A vagrant girl who lives with robots.
She is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart.
She wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.

337982.name: Luka
337982.lore:
The boxing champion in Belobog's Underworld, and one of Wildfire's most capable fighters.
The consecutive champion of the Fight Club, his enthusiasm inspires children of the Underworld who dare to dream.

633349.name: Ancient Spindle
633349.desc: Mechanical spindle left behind from the Old World. Normal material used for enhancement.
633349.lore:
Once taken apart, the precision components can never be put back together. Even the maintenance veterans in Belobog's Technology Division would think twice before touching it.

"You idiot, the Bluecoats will only give you a few canned goods for this. Take it to Boss Svarog and you won't need to worry about food and clothing for a while."
comeFrom: Automatons at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

676263.name: Adversarial
676263.desc: Light Cone for the Path of The Hunt. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676263.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Freedom fighters will never die, as their stories will forever be told."

676266.name: Loop
676266.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676266.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Those running away from the past think no one understands their despair. When they finally take a breather, they'll find their future selves staring right at them with bloodshot eyes."

717289.name: Silvermane Medal
717289.desc: Medal of honor worn by soldiers of the Silvermane Guards with gallant and meritorious service. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717289.lore:
A proof of honor awarded to those that fought against Fragmentum creatures, Underworlders, and sudden disasters.
It is not usually pinned onto the recipient's chest, but rather placed onto his coffin.

"Remember, young Gepard. It is not a toy: it is the destiny and blood of the Landau family."
comeFrom: Everwinter Shadewalker and Incineration Shadewalker at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Silvermane Guards and vagrants at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717319.name: Conqueror's Will
717319.desc: Condensed anti-matter. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717319.lore:
Highly condensed anti-matter within the body of the Voidranger: Trampler. The moment of obliteration is the trumpet call for civilizations' destruction.

"They are all looking forward to the moment of obliteration, when they will be reforged and fused with the entire world."
comeFrom: Antimatter Legion at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717320.name: Squirming Core
717320.desc: The heart of a monster wandering the Fragmentum. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717320.lore:
It is a lesion that breeds evil, the impulse to sin. It is the source of the Fragmentum distortion.
The heart is pulsating slowly, with a residual force powerful enough to cause a new calamity. It's best to destroy it to prevent further troubles.

"It's like a cancer..."
comeFrom: Certain Fragmentum Monsters at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717385.name: Artifex's Gyreheart
717385.desc: Components used in Xianzhou's ingenium creations. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717385.lore:
The core of Xianzhou's ingenium technology. The armillary sphere roils and vibrates like the essence of a heart, making the machine think like a living being.

"Do not be startled. Taking away its heart would make him... her?... No, make it lose its sentience and return to its mechanical sources."
comeFrom: Entranced Ingenia at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

717386.name: Immortal Lumintwig
717386.desc: Deciduous twigs from an ancient divine construct. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717386.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. After the Three Sufferings, Xianzhou laid in devastation. The Homo celestinae fell as demons, and catastrophes occurred ceaselessly.

"As decreed by the Ten-Lords Commission, all who are near the mara-struck state will be seized by the infernal judges and cast into the Shackling Prison."
comeFrom: Abominations of Abundance at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

754821.name: The Birth of the Self
754821.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754821.lore:
In the beginning, it had the exact same pose as the previous portrait.
Looking at the face identical to hers, she was convinced that this was not her.

"Impossible. How can two portraits be exactly the same?"

She tweaked its joints, opened its eyes, and made its fingers softer.
She looked happy when all the changes were done.

"Completely different from yesterday. This is more like who I am today."

754835.name: Eyes of the Prey
754835.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754835.lore:
In reality, most prey don't realize when danger is encroaching.
This one's no exception.
The sniper's scope slowly centers on a man throwing banknotes stack after stack, who seems completely oblivious to his impending demise.
"So that's what greed looks like. That amount is equal to several of my contracts already... No wonder someone wants him dead."

As if these thoughts were broadcasted out loud, the man in the scope turns his head, looking straight into the eyes of the sniper.
"I've been waiting for you. Would this much be enough for you to hear me out?"

792908.name: Void
792908.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792908.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"He stared into the void, hanging high like the dark sun at the end of all matter, or a mouth that answered all questions. It said: ███ █ ███ ██ The answer couldn't be expressed in any human language, but could be understood by all."

838765.name: Make the World Clamor
838765.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Erudition. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838765.lore:
She stood on the stage, waving at her audience, encouraging them to make their voice heard.
Songs, shouting, or sigh — anything that makes a sound.
Voice your thoughts, so others can come to help.

"Don't make your heart as cold as this concrete jungle."

— Make the world clamor.

955409.name: River Flows in Spring
955409.desc: Light Cone for the Path of The Hunt. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955409.lore:
The young boy took a short break from his sword practice.
The sunlight was baking his already heated neck. He slowly got into the water, whose coldness touched his bare feet.
When the bell chimes and birds tweet, even the people far away would know that springtime had arrived.

955410.name: We Are Wildfire
955410.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Preservation. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955410.lore:
She got used to people losing their homes.
And she got used to people losing their lives.
But crying alone was useless.

"Wear this red scarf, and then we shall share each other's pain."
"We are family. We are Wildfire."

The moment that pair of big hands held her head, she could no longer hold back her tears.

955420.name: We Will Meet Again
955420.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Nihility. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955420.lore:
She had once thought it was some sort of program. How else would it never tire?
But a program would never actively discard the optimal solution and bypass her trap.

"Seems like we'll have a war of attrition."
She yawns.

"Time to sleep. Organic lifeforms should treasure rest."
The surroundings dim.

She suddenly bolts awake, but the residues of data are swept away and destroyed. It all seems like a dream
— but the taste of defeat is very real.

969513.name: Natasha
969513.lore:
A doctor from the Underworld and a caregiver of children.
Alongside her kindness and caring, she also has a hidden dangerous side.
